name: Paragraph
content:
# Paragraph The `

` tag is used to define a paragraph of text.

examples.name: Multiple Short Paragraphs
examples.code:
```

My favorite animals are birds.

My favorite sport is baseball.

```

examples.name: Single Longer Paragraph
examples.description:
Using `

` to define a paragraph of multiple lines.
examples.code:
```

Soccer is an awesome sport because you get to play on a team with all your friends. My favorite players are Megan Rapinoe from the United States, and Marta from Brazil.

```

short_description:
Paragraph
The <p> tag is used to  define a paragraph of text.
tips:
* We can use the `

` tag to write several paragraphs. * We can use the `

` tag to write a paragraph of multiple lines.
